text: Corporación Cuba Ron is a state-run bottler of Havana Club and other alcoholic beverages in Cuba. Founded in 1993, it has been under the Cuban Ministry of the Food Industry since 2000.https://www.ecured.cu/Corporaci%C3%B3n_Cuba_Ron_S.A. ==Operations== * Santa Cruz: liqueurs, as well as mugs and miniature bottles of Havana Club and Cubay rums * Villa Clara: Cubay rums * Santiago de Cuba: Santiago de Cuba rum and home to Ron Museum * San Cristóba: table wines, other beverages and spirits * Cerro: Cuba Ron Distribution Centre * Santa Cruz del Norte: soft drinks, carbonated waters, fruit beverages, yeast production ==References== Category:Drink companies of Cuba Category:Companies established in 1993 Category:Alcohol in Cuba
title: Corporación Cuba Ron
